   20: 
   21: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   22: %%%
   23: %%% Define to run outside of test server
   24: %%%
   25: %%% -define(STANDALONE,1).
   26: %%%
   27: %%%
   28: %%% Define for debug output
   29: %%%
   30: %%% -define(debug,1).
   31: 
   32: -module(trace_call_time_SUITE).
   33: 
   34: %% Exported end user tests
   35: 
   36: -export([seq/3, seq_r/3]).
   37: -export([loaded/1, a_function/1, a_called_function/1, dec/1, nif_dec/1, dead_tracer/1,
   38:         return_stop/1,catch_crash/1]).
   39: 
   40: -define(US_ERROR, 10000).
   41: -define(R_ERROR, 0.8).
   42: -define(SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME, 10).
   43: 
   44: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   45: %% Result examination macros
   46: 
   47: -define(CT(P,MFA),{trace,P,call,MFA}).
   48: -define(CTT(P, MFA),{trace_ts,P,call,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
   49: -define(RF(P,MFA,V),{trace,P,return_from,MFA,V}).
   50: -define(RFT(P,MFA,V),{trace_ts,P,return_from,MFA,V,{_,_,_}}).
   51: -define(RT(P,MFA),{trace,P,return_to,MFA}).
   52: -define(RTT(P,MFA),{trace_ts,P,return_to,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
   53: 
   54: -ifdef(debug).
   55: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   56: -else.
   57: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   58: -endif.
   59: 
   60: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: 
   64: %% When run in test server.
   65: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   66:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   67:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   68:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   69: -export([basic/1, on_and_off/1, info/1,
   70:          apply_bif_bug/1, abb_worker/1,
   71:          disable_ongoing/1,
   72: 	 pause_and_restart/1, scheduling/1, called_function/1, combo/1, 
   73: 	 bif/1, nif/1]).
   74: 
   75: 
   76: suite() ->
   77:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   78:      {timetrap, {minutes, 10}}].
   79: 
   80: all() ->
   81:     trace_sessions:all().
   82: 
   83: groups() ->
   84:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
   85: 
   86: testcases() ->
   87:     [basic, on_and_off, info, pause_and_restart, scheduling,
   88:      disable_ongoing,
   89:      apply_bif_bug,
   90:      combo, bif, nif, called_function, dead_tracer, return_stop,
   91:      catch_crash].
   92: 
   93: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   94:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config, ?MODULE).
   95: 
   96: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   97:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   98: 
   99: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  100:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
  101: 
  102: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  103:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
  104: 
  105: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  106:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false,
  107:                          [local,meta,call_time,call_count,call_memory]),
  108:     erlang_trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time,call_count]),
  109:     timer:now_diff(now(),now()),
  110:     trace_sessions:init_per_testcase(Config).
  111: 
  112: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  113:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false,
  114:                          [local,meta,call_time,call_count,call_memory]),
  115:     erlang_trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time,call_count]),
  116:     erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
  117:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config).
  118: 
  119: 
  120: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
  121:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
  122: 
  123: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
  124:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
  125: 
  126: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
  127:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
  128: 
  129: 
  130: %% Tests basic call time trace
  131: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  132:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  133:     M = 700,
  134:     %%
  135:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  136:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  137:     Pid = setup(),
  138:     {L,  T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> (X+1) end) end),
  139:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq,   3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  140:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [], none),
  141: 
  142:     {Lr, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> (X+1) end) end),
  143:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq,   3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  144:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Pid, 1, 0, 0}], T2/M),
  145:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  146:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  147: 
  148:     %%
  149:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  150:     Pid ! quit,
  151:     ok.
  152: 
  153: %% Tests disable ongoing call_time traced function
  154: disable_ongoing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  156:     %%
  157:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_a, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  158:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_b, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  159:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_c, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  160:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_d, 0}, true, [call_time]),
  161: 
  162:     Pid = setup(),
  163: 
  164:     Self = self(),
  165:     Pid  ! {self(), execute, fun() -> disong_a(Self) end},
  166: 
  167:     c_ready = receive M1 -> M1 end,
  168: 
  169:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_b,1}, false, [call_time]),
  170: 
  171:     Pid ! go_on,
  172: 
  173:     {Pid, answer, _} = receive M2 -> M2
  174:                        after 1000 -> timeout end,
  175: 
  176:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  177:     Pid ! quit,
  178:     ok.
  179: 
  180: disong_a(Pid) ->
  181:     ForceStack = id(a),
  182:     disong_b(Pid),
  183:     disong_d(),
  184:     ForceStack.
  185: 
  186: disong_b(Pid) ->
  187:     ForceStack = id(b),
  188:     disong_c(Pid),
  189:     ForceStack.
  190: 
  191: disong_c(Pid) ->
  192:     Pid ! c_ready,
  193:     receive
  194:         go_on -> ok
  195:     end.
  196: 
  197: disong_d() ->
  198:     ok.
  199: 
  200: id(I) ->
  201:     I.
  202: 
  203: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  204: 
  205: 
  206: %% "Tests turning trace parameters on and off
  207: on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  208:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  209:     M = 100,
  210:     %%
  211:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  212:     Pid = setup(),
  213:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, seq, [1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end]}),
  214:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  215: 
  216:     N = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  217:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  218:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  219: 
  220:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  221:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  222:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T3),
  223: 
  224:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, false, [call_time]),
  225:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, false, none),
  226:     {L, _T4} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  227:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, false, none),
  228:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [], none),
  229:     {Lr, T5} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  230:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T5),
  231: 
  232:     N = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  233:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, false, none),
  234:     {Lr, _T6} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  235:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, false, none),
  236:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  237:     %%
  238:     Pid ! quit,
  239:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  240:     ok.
  241: 
  242: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  243: 
  244: %% Tests the trace_info BIF
  245: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  246:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  247:     %%
  248:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,3}, true, [call_time]),
  249:     {call_time,[]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  250:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, pause, [call_time]),
  251:     {call_time,[]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  252:     {all,[_|_]=L} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, all),
  253:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, L),
  254:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, restart, [call_time]),
  255:     {call_time,[]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  256:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, false, [call_time]),
  257:     {call_time,false} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  258:     {all,false} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, all),
  259:     %%
  260:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  261:     ok.
  262: 
  263: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  264: 
  265: %% Tests pausing and restarting call time counters
  266: pause_and_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  267:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  268:     M = 100,
  269:     Pid = setup(),
  270:     %%
  271:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  272:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [], none),
  273:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  274:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T1),
  275:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, pause, [call_time]),
  276:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T1),
  277:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  278:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T2),
  279:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, restart, [call_time]),
  280:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [], none),
  281:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  282:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T3),
  283:     %%
  284:     Pid ! quit,
  285:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  286:     ok.
  287: 
  288: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  289: 
  290: %% Tests in/out scheduling of call time counters
  291: scheduling(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  292:     P  = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  293:     M  = 1000000,
  294:     Np = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  295:     F  = 12,
  296: 
  297:     %% setup load processes
  298:     %% (single, no internal calls)
  299: 
  300:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,loaded,2}, true, [call_time]),
  301: 
  302:     Pids     = [setup() || _ <- lists:seq(1, F*Np)],
  303:     {_Ls,T1} = execute(Pids, {?MODULE,loaded,[M]}),
  304:     [Pid ! quit || Pid <- Pids],
  305: 
  306:     %% logic dictates that each process will get ~ 1/F of the schedulers time
  307: 
  308:     {call_time, CT} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,loaded,2}, call_time),
  309: 
  310:     lists:foreach(fun (Pid) ->
  311:                           ok = case check_process_time(lists:keysearch(Pid, 1, CT), M, F, T1) of
  312:                                    schedule_time_error ->
  313:                                        test_server:comment("Warning: Failed time ratio"),
  314:                                        ok;
  315:                                    Other -> Other
  316:                                end
  317:                   end, Pids),
  318:     P  = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  319:     ok.
  320: 
  321: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  322: 
  323: %% "Tests combining local call trace and meta trace with call time trace
  324: combo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  325:     Self = self(),
  326:     Nbc = 3,
  327:     MetaMs = [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  328:     Flags = lists:sort([call, return_to]),
  329:     LocalTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(5 + Nbc + 3, Self) end),
  330:     MetaTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(9 + Nbc + 3, Self) end),
  331:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, [], [local]),
  332:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  333:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, MetaMs, [{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  334:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_count]),
  335:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_memory]),
  336: 
  337:     % bifs
  338:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, [], [local]),
  339:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  340:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, MetaMs, [{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  341:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_count]),
  342:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_memory]),
  343: 
  344:     1 = erlang_trace(Self, true, [{tracer,LocalTracer} | Flags]),
  345:     %%
  346:     {traced,local} =
  347:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, traced),
  348:     {match_spec,[]} =
  349:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, match_spec),
  350:     {meta,MetaTracer} =
  351:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, meta),
  352:     {meta_match_spec,MetaMs} =
  353:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, meta_match_spec),
  354:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [], none),
  355: 
  356:     %% check empty trace_info for ?MODULE:seq_r/3
  357:     {all,[_|_]=TraceInfo}     = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, all),
  358:     io:format("TraceInfo=~p\n",[TraceInfo]),
  359:     {value,{traced,local}}    = lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfo),
  360:     {value,{match_spec,[]}}   = lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfo),
  361:     {value,{meta,MetaTracer}} = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfo),
  362:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MetaMs}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfo),
  363:     {value,{call_count,0}} = lists:keysearch(call_count, 1, TraceInfo),
  364:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, TraceInfo),
  365:     {value,{call_memory,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_memory, 1, TraceInfo),
  366: 
  367:     %% check empty trace_info for erlang:term_to_binary/1
  368:     {all, [_|_] = TraceInfoBif} = erlang_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, all),
  369:     {value,{traced,local}}     = lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  370:     {value,{match_spec,[]}}    = lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  371:     {value,{meta, MetaTracer}}  = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  372:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MetaMs}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  373:     {value,{call_count,0}} = lists:keysearch(call_count, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  374:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  375:     {value,{call_memory,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_memory, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  376: 
  377:     %%
  378:     [3,2,1] = seq_r(1, 3, fun(X) -> X+1 end),
  379:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  380:     with_bif(Nbc),
  381:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  382:     TimeB = erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond),
  383:     %%
  384: 
  385:     List = collect(100),
  386:     {MetaR, LocalR} =
  387:     lists:foldl(
  388:       fun ({P,X}, {M,L}) when P == MetaTracer ->
  389:               {[X|M],L};
  390:           ({P,X}, {M,L}) when P == LocalTracer ->
  391:               {M,[X|L]}
  392:       end,
  393:       {[],[]},
  394:       List),
  395:     Meta = lists:reverse(MetaR),
  396:     Local = lists:reverse(LocalR),
  397: 
  398:     [?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_]}),
  399:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_,[]]}),
  400:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[2,3,_,[1]]}),
  401:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[3,3,_,[2,1]]}),
  402:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  403:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  404:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  405:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,3},[3,2,1]),
  406:      ?CTT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[3]}), % bif
  407:      ?RFT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,1},<<131,97,3>>),
  408:      ?CTT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[2]}),
  409:      ?RFT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,1},<<131,97,2>>)
  410:     ] = Meta,
  411: 
  412:     [?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_]}),
  413:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_,[]]}),
  414:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[2,3,_,[1]]}),
  415:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[3,3,_,[2,1]]}),
  416:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,combo,1}),
  417:      ?CT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[3]}), % bif
  418:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,with_bif,1}),
  419:      ?CT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[2]}),
  420:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,with_bif,1})
  421:     ] = Local,
  422: 
  423:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Self,1,0,0}], 1),
  424:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Self,3,0,0}], 1),
  425:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Self,1,0,0}], 1),
  426:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Self,3,0,0}], 1),
  427:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, [{self(), Nbc - 1, 0, 0}], TimeB),
  428:     %%
  429:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [local,meta,call_time]),
  430:     erlang_trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time]),
  431:     erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
  432:     ok.
  433: 
  434: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  435: 
  436: %% Tests tracing of bifs
  437: bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  438:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  439:     M = 5000000,
  440:     %%
  441:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, binary_to_term, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  442:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  443:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, with_bif, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  444:     Pid = setup(),
  445:     {L, Tot1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_bif(M) end),
  446: 
  447:     {call_time,[{Pid,_,S,Us}]}=WB = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,with_bif,1}, call_time),
  448:     T1 = Tot1 - (S*1000_000 + Us),
  449: 
  450:     B2T = erlang_trace_info({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, call_time),
  451:     T2B = erlang_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, call_time),
  452:     io:format("with_bif       = ~p\n", [WB]),
  453:     io:format("binary_to_term = ~p\n", [B2T]),
  454:     io:format("term_to_binary = ~p\n", [T2B]),
  455:     Sum = us(WB) + us(B2T) + us(T2B),
  456:     io:format("Sum  = ~p us\n", [Sum]),
  457:     io:format("Tot1 = ~p us  Diff = ~p us\n", [Tot1, Tot1-Sum]),
  458:     ok = check_trace_info_ret({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}],
  459:                               T1/2, B2T),
  460:     ok = check_trace_info_ret({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}],
  461:                               T1/2, T2B),
  462: 
  463:     % disable term2binary
  464: 
  465:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, false, [call_time]),
  466: 
  467:     {L, _T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_bif(M) end),
  468: 
  469:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, [{Pid, M*2 - 2, 0, 0}], T1),
  470:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, false, none),
  471: 
  472:     %%
  473:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  474:     Pid ! quit,
  475:     ok.
  476: 
  477: us({call_time,[{_,_,S,Us}]}) ->
  478:     S*1000_000 + Us.
  479: 
  480: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  481: 
  482: %% Tests tracing of nifs
  483: nif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  484:     load_nif(Config),
  485:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  486:     M = 5000000,
  487:     %%
  488:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, nif_dec,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  489:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, with_nif, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  490:     Pid = setup(),
  491:     {_, Tot1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_nif(M) end),
  492: 
  493:     {call_time,[{Pid,_,S,Us}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,with_nif,1}, call_time),
  494:     T1 = Tot1 - (S*1000000 + Us),
  495: 
  496:     % the nif is called M - 1 times, the last time the function with 'with_nif'
  497:     % returns ok and does not call the nif.
  498:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, nif_dec,  1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}], T1),
  499: 
  500:     %%
  501:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  502:     Pid ! quit,
  503:     ok.
  504: 
  505: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  506: 
  507: %% Tests combining nested function calls and that the time accumulates to the right function
  508: called_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  509:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  510:     M = 2100,
  511:     Pid = setup(),
  512:     %%
  513:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,a_function,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  514:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  515:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  516: 
  517:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,a_called_function,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  518:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  519:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M, 0, 0}],
  520:                           T1 + M*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME),
  521:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_called_function, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  522: 
  523: 
  524:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,dec,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  525:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  526:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M+M, 0, 0}],
  527:                           T1 + (M+M)*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME),
  528:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_called_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M, 0, 0}],
  529:                           T2 + M*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME ),
  530:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, dec, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T3),
  531: 
  532:     Pid ! quit,
  533:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  534:     ok.
  535: 
  536: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  537: 
  538: dead_tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  539:     TracedMFAs = dead_tracer_mfas(),
  540: 
  541:     Self = self(),
  542:     FirstTracer = tracer(),
  543:     StartTracing = fun() -> turn_on_tracing(Self) end,
  544:     tell_tracer(FirstTracer, StartTracing),
  545:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8] = seq(1, 8, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  546:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, FirstTracer),
  547:     FirstTracer ! quit,
  548:     receive
  549:         {'DOWN',Ref,process,FirstTracer,normal} ->
  550:             ok
  551:     end,
  552:     erlang:yield(),
  553: 
  554:     %% Collect and check that we only get call_time info for the current process.
  555:     Info1 = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  556:     [] = other_than_self(Info1),
  557:     io:format("~p\n", [Info1]),
  558: 
  559:     %% Note that we have not turned off tracing for the current process,
  560:     %% but that the tracer has terminated. No more call_time information should be recorded.
  561:     [1,2,3] = seq(1, 3, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  562:     [] = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  563: 
  564:     %% When we start a second tracer process, that tracer process must
  565:     %% not inherit the tracing flags and the dead tracer (even though
  566:     %% we used set_on_spawn).
  567:     SecondTracer = tracer(),
  568:     tell_tracer(SecondTracer, StartTracing),
  569:     Seq20 = lists:seq(1, 20),
  570:     Seq20 = seq(1, 20, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  571:     Info2 = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  572:     io:format("~p\n", [Info2]),
  573:     [] = other_than_self(Info2),
  574:     SecondTracer ! quit,
  575: 
  576:     ok.
  577: 
  578: other_than_self(Info) ->
  579:     [{Pid,MFA} || {MFA,[{Pid,_,_,_}]} <- Info,
  580:                   Pid =/= self()].
  581: 
  582: tell_tracer(Tracer, Fun) ->
  583:     Tracer ! {execute,self(),Fun},
  584:     receive
  585:         {Tracer,executed} ->
  586:             ok
  587:     end.
  588: 
  589: tracer() ->
  590:     spawn_link(fun Loop() ->
  591:                       receive
  592:                           quit ->
  593:                               ok;
  594:                           {execute,From,Fun} ->
  595:                               Fun(),
  596:                               From ! {self(),executed},
  597:                               Loop()
  598:                       end
  599:               end).
  600: 
  601: turn_on_tracing(Pid) ->
  602:     _ = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call,set_on_spawn]),
  603:     _ = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  604:     _ = now(),
  605:     ok.
  606: 
  607: %% We want to trace functions local to this module as well as all BIFs, and for
  608: %% the latter we need to ensure that their modules are loaded.
  609: dead_tracer_mfas() ->
  610:     Modules = [M || {M,_F,_A} <- erlang:system_info(snifs)],
  611:     Whitelist0 = gb_sets:from_list(Modules),
  612:     Whitelist = case code:ensure_modules_loaded(Modules) of
  613:                   {error, Reasons} ->
  614:                       Blacklist = gb_sets:from_list([M || {M, _} <- Reasons]),
  615:                       gb_sets:subtract(Whitelist0, Blacklist);
  616:                   ok ->
  617:                       Whitelist0
  618:               end,
  619:     EligibleSNIFs = [MFA || {M,_F,_A}=MFA <- erlang:system_info(snifs),
  620:                             gb_sets:is_element(M, Whitelist)],
  621:     [{?MODULE,F,A} || {F,A} <- module_info(functions)] ++ EligibleSNIFs.
  622: 
  623: collect_all_info([MFA|T]) ->
  624:     CallTime = erlang_trace_info(MFA, call_time),
  625:     erlang_trace_pattern(MFA, restart, [call_time]),
  626:     case CallTime of
  627:         {call_time,false} ->
  628:             collect_all_info(T);
  629:         {call_time,[]} ->
  630:             collect_all_info(T);
  631:         {call_time,[_|_]=List} ->
  632:             [{MFA,List}|collect_all_info(T)]
  633:     end;
  634: collect_all_info([]) -> [].
  635: 
  636: 
  637: %% OTP-16111: Verify call_time does not increase after traced function returns.
  638: return_stop(_Config) ->
  639:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  640:     %%
  641:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  642:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,bbb,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  643:     Pid = setup(),
  644:     {aaa, T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> aaa()  end),
  645:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  646:     io:format("T1=~p us, US1=~p us\n", [T1, US1]),
  647:     true = (US1 =< T1),
  648: 
  649:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  650: 
  651:     execute(Pid, fun() -> loaded(1000000)  end),
  652:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  653: 
  654:     {bbb,  _} = execute(Pid, fun() -> bbb()  end),
  655:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  656: 
  657:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,spinner,  1}, true, [call_time]),
  658:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,quicky,  0}, true, [call_time]),
  659:     {spinner,  T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> spinner(1000000)  end),
  660:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, SpS, SpUS}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,spinner,1}, call_time),
  661:     Spinner = SpS*1000000 + SpUS,
  662:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, Quicky}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,quicky,0}, call_time),
  663:     io:format("T2=~p us, Spinner=~p us, Quicky=~p us\n", [T2, Spinner, Quicky]),
  664: 
  665:     %% Before fix: quicky() got attributed the call_time of its caller spinner().
  666:     true = (Quicky =< Spinner),
  667:     true = (Spinner =< T2),
  668: 
  669:     %%
  670:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  671:     Pid ! quit,
  672:     ok.
  673: 
  674: 
  675: aaa() ->
  676:     aaa.
  677: bbb() ->
  678:    bbb.
  679: 
  680: spinner(N) ->
  681:     quicky(),
  682:     loaded(N),
  683:     spinner.
  684: 
  685: quicky() ->
  686:     done.
  687: 
  688: %% OTP-16994: next_catch returned a bogus stack pointer when call_time tracing
  689: %% was enabled, crashing the emulator.
  690: catch_crash(_Config) ->
  691:     Fun = id(fun() -> catch_crash_1() end),
  692: 
  693:     _ = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  694:     _ = erlang_trace(self(), true, [call]),
  695: 
  696:     Res = (catch Fun()),
  697: 
  698:     _ = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  699:     _ = erlang_trace(self(), false, [call]),
  700: 
  701:     id(Res),
  702: 
  703:     ok.
  704: 
  705: catch_crash_1() ->
  706:     error(crash).
  707: 
  708: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  709: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  710: %% Local helpers
  711: 
  712: load_nif(Config) ->
  713:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  714:     case erlang:load_nif(filename:join(Path,"trace_nif"), 0) of
  715:         ok ->
  716:             ok;
  717:         {error, {reload, _}} ->
  718:             ok
  719:     end.
  720: 
  721: 
  722: %% Stack recursive seq
  723: seq(Stop, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  724:     [Stop];
  725: seq(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  726:     [Start | seq(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ)].
  727: 
  728: 
  729: a_function(1) -> a_called_function(1);
  730: a_function(N) when N > 1 -> a_function(a_called_function(N)).
  731: 
  732: a_called_function(N) -> dec(N).
  733: 
  734: with_bif(1) -> ok;
  735: with_bif(N) ->
  736:     with_bif(erlang:binary_to_term(erlang:term_to_binary(N)) - 1).
  737: 
  738: with_nif(0) -> error;
  739: with_nif(1) -> ok;
  740: with_nif(N) ->
  741:     with_nif(?MODULE:nif_dec(N)).
  742: 
  743: 
  744: nif_dec(_) -> 0.
  745: 
  746: dec(N) ->
  747:     loaded(10000),
  748:     N - 1.
  749: 
  750: loaded(N) -> loaded(N, 1.0).
  751: loaded(N, M) when N > 1 -> loaded(N - 1, M * 1.0001);
  752: loaded(_, M) -> M.
  753: 
  754: 
  755: %% Tail recursive seq, result list is reversed
  756: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  757:     seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, []).
  758: 
  759: seq_r(Stop, Stop, _, R) ->
  760:     [Stop | R];
  761: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, R) ->
  762:     seq_r(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ, [Start | R]).
  763: 
  764: % Check call time tracing data and print mismatches
  765: check_trace_info(Mfa, Expect, Time) ->
  766:     check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, Expect, Time, erlang_trace_info(Mfa, call_time)).
  767: 
  768: check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, [{Pid, ExpectedC,_,_}] = Expect, Time, TraceInfo) ->
  769:     {call_time,[{Pid,Cnt,S,Us}]} = TraceInfo,
  770: 
  771:     {Mod, Name, Arity} = Mfa,
  772:     IsBuiltin = erlang:is_builtin(Mod, Name, Arity),
  773:     ok = if
  774:         %% Call count on BIFs may exceed number of calls as they often trap to
  775:         %% themselves.
  776:         IsBuiltin, Cnt >= ExpectedC ->
  777:             ok;
  778:         not IsBuiltin, Cnt =:= ExpectedC ->
  779:             ok;
  780:         true ->
  781:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p}~n"
  782:                       " - got call count ~w~p",
  783:                       [Mfa, Expect, Cnt]),
  784:             count_error
  785:     end,
  786: 
  787:     true = (S >= 0),
  788:     true = (Us >= 0),
  789:     Sum = S*1000_000 + Us,
  790:     if
  791:         abs(1 - Time/Sum) < ?R_ERROR; abs(Time - Sum) < ?US_ERROR ->
  792:             ok;
  793:         true ->
  794:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p (Time ~p us)}~n - got ~w "
  795:                       "s. ~w us. = ~w us. - ~w -> delta ~w (ratio ~.2f, "
  796:                       "should be 1.0)~n",
  797:                       [Mfa, Expect, Time,
  798:                        S, Us, Sum, Time, Sum - Time, Time/Sum]),
  799:             time_error
  800:     end;
  801: check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, Expect, _, TraceInfo) ->
  802:     case TraceInfo of
  803:         {call_time, Expect} ->
  804:             ok;
  805:         Other ->
  806:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p}~n - got ~p~n", [Mfa, Expect, Other]),
  807:             result_not_expected_error
  808:     end.
  809: 
  810: 
  811: %check process time
  812: check_process_time({value,{Pid, M, S, Us}}, M, F, Time) ->
  813:     Sum = S*1000000 + Us,
  814:     if
  815:         abs(1 - (F/(Time/Sum))) < ?R_ERROR ->
  816:             ok;
  817:         true ->
  818:             io:format("- Pid ~p, Got ratio ~.2f, expected ratio ~w~n", [Pid, Time/Sum,F]),
  819:             schedule_time_error
  820:     end;
  821: check_process_time(Other, M, _, _) ->
  822:     io:format(" - Got ~p, expected count ~w~n", [Other, M]),
  823:     error.
  824: 
  825: 
  826: 
  827: %% Message relay process
  828: relay_n(0, _) ->
  829:     ok;
  830: relay_n(N, Dest) ->
  831:     receive Msg ->
  832:                 Dest ! {self(), Msg},
  833:                 relay_n(N-1, Dest)
  834:     end.
  835: 
  836: 
  837: 
  838: %% Collect received messages
  839: collect(Time) ->
  840:     Ref = erlang:start_timer(Time, self(), done),
  841:     L = lists:reverse(collect([], Ref)),
  842:     ?dbgformat("Got: ~p~n",[L]),
  843:     L.
  844: 
  845: collect(A, 0) ->
  846:     receive
  847:         Mess ->
  848:             collect([Mess | A], 0)
  849:     after 0 ->
  850:               A
  851:     end;
  852: collect(A, Ref) ->
  853:     receive
  854:         {timeout, Ref, done} ->
  855:             collect(A, 0);
  856:         Mess ->
  857:             collect([Mess | A], Ref)
  858:     end.
  859: 
  860: setup() ->
  861:     setup([]).
  862: 
  863: setup(Opts) ->
  864:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun() -> loop() end,
  865:                    [link, {max_heap_size, 12000}]),
  866:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call|Opts]),
  867:     Pid.
  868: 
  869: execute(Pids, Mfa) when is_list(Pids) ->
  870:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  871:     [P  ! {self(), execute, Mfa} || P <- Pids],
  872:     As = [receive {P, answer, Answer} -> Answer end || P <- Pids],
  873:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  874:     {As, erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond)};
  875: execute(P, Mfa) ->
  876:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  877:     P  ! {self(), execute, Mfa},
  878:     A  = receive {P, answer, Answer} -> Answer end,
  879:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  880:     {A, erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond)}.
  881: 
  882: 
  883: 
  884: loop() ->
  885:     receive
  886:         quit ->
  887:             ok;
  888:         {Pid, execute, Fun } when is_function(Fun) ->
  889:             %% Make sure we always run with the same amount of reductions.
  890:             erlang:yield(),
  891:             Pid ! {self(), answer, erlang:apply(Fun, [])},
  892:             loop();
  893:         {Pid, execute, {M, F, A}} ->
  894:             erlang:yield(),
  895:             Pid ! {self(), answer, erlang:apply(M, F, A)},
  896:             loop()
  897:     end.
  898: 
  899: %% OTP-17290, GH-4635
  900: apply_bif_bug(_Config) ->
  901:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, abb_worker, [self()]),
  902:     erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call]),
  903:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,abb_foo,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  904:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,display,1}, true, [call_time]),
  905:     Pid ! {call, erlang, display, ["Hej"]},
  906:     receive
  907:         done -> ok
  908:     end,
  909:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]).
  910: 
  911: abb_worker(Papa) ->
  912:     receive
  913:         {call, M, F, Args} ->
  914:             abb_foo(M, F, Args),
  915:             Papa ! done
  916:     end.
  917: 
  918: 
  919: abb_foo(M,F,Args) ->
  920:     apply(M,F,Args).
